The change in value associated with the passage of time for the three bonds represented
in Figure 2 is presented graphically in Figure 3. This convergence to par value at
maturity is known as the constant-yield price trajectory because it shows how the bond's
price would change as time passes if its yield-to-maturity remained constant.
